name: Bomber Airships
description:
A two-player game for the ZX Spectrum Next based on Atari's Canyon Bomber.

This is a game for one or two players where players drop bombs from their airships and destroy the targets below. Targets are worth different amount of points according to their numbers. Each game is two minutes long and the player with the most points at the end of that time is declared the winner.

To start the game, select the number of players and press Enter for standard mode or Caps Shift+R for random mode.

There are two airships. Red is Player 1 and blue is Player 2. To drop a bomb, press A (player 1) or L (player 2).
